original_text: Then Paul put his hands on each believer's head. When he did this, the Holy Spirit came down on them. They spoke in different languages and they spoke messages from God.
korean_text: 바울이 그들에게 안수하매 성령이 그들에게 임하시므로 방언도 하고 예언도 하니

sentences.original_text: Then Paul put his hands on each believer's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바울은 각 신자의 머리에 손을 얹었습니다

sentences.original_text: the Holy Spirit came down on them
and they spoke messages from God
